title: How to Get to Cinque Terre 2025

seo.title: Getting to Cinque Terre 2025 | Train, Car, Airport & Transport Guide
seo.description: Complete guide to reaching Cinque Terre by train, car, plane, and ferry. Airport transfers, parking info, and best transport options.

body.title: Getting to Cinque Terre
body.subtitle: Complete transport guide with train connections, airport transfers, car access, and practical tips for reaching the five villages

features.title: By Train (Recommended)
features.description: Regular trains from La Spezia and Levanto connect all villages. Most convenient and scenic option.

features.title: Nearest Airports
features.description: Pisa (1.5 hours), Genoa (2 hours), Florence (2.5 hours) with train connections to La Spezia

features.title: By Car & Parking
features.description: Limited road access, parking only in La Spezia or Levanto. Villages are mostly car-free zones

features.title: Bus Connections
features.description: Local buses connect hilltop areas and sanctuaries not reachable by train

features.title: Ferry Service
features.description: Seasonal ferries from La Spezia, Levanto, and Portovenere (March to October)

features.title: Cinque Terre Card
features.description: Unlimited train travel between villages plus hiking trail access and benefits

body.title: Plan Your Journey
body.description: Check maps, weather conditions, and best times to visit Cinque Terre
